name: Raft Wars
storyline: A 3 year old kid named Simon finds gold and diamonds while playing on the beach and makes news. A bunch of groups like the pirates, vikings etc. fight him for the treasure but he teams up with his brother to fight them off. Finally their face their neighbours who kidnap their parents but the brothers are able to fight them of and rescue them. As a big plot twist, the parents turn against their son, but in the end they are fend off by the brothers as well and Simon safely buries the treasure in the beach.
summary: Raft Wars is a popular flash game from the late 2000s. It is a strategic shooter game similar to the popular mobile game Angry Birds. As the end of support for flash happened at the end of 2020, the developer and his team ported the game to the most advanced web platform HTML5 and released it on late 2019.
